sen.j: 笠置町（かさぎちょう）は、京都府相楽郡にある町である。
sen.e: Kasagi-cho is a town in Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kasagi-cho is a town in Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kasagi-cho is a town in Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 「美しい自然と史跡に恵まれた心ふれあう町」を町の標語に掲げている。
sen.e: The town adopts a motto 'Heart-warming town surrounded by beautiful nature and historic places.'
The town has adopted the motto 'Heart-warming town surrounded by beautiful nature and historic places.'
The town has adopted the motto 'Heart-warming town surrounded by beautiful nature and historic places.'

sen.j: 町の特産品は、シイタケ、きゅうり。
sen.e: Local products are shiitake mushrooms and cucumbers.
Local products are shiitake mushrooms and cucumbers.
Local products are shiitake mushrooms and cucumbers.

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 沿革
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1889年（明治22年）4月1日 相楽郡笠置村、切山村、有市村、飛鳥路村が合併して笠置村誕生
sen.e: On April 1, 1889 Kasagi-mura of Soraku-gun, Kiriyama-mura, Ariichi-mura, and Asukaji-mura were merged to form Kasagi-mura.
On April 1, 1889 Kasagi-mura of Soraku-gun, Kiriyama-mura, Ariichi-mura, and Asukaji-mura were merged to form Kasagi-mura.
April 1, 1889: Kasagi-mura, Kiriyama-mura, Ariichi-mura, and Asukaji-mura of Soraku-gun were merged to form Kasagi-mura.
sen.cmt: 相楽郡の位置を変更しました。「"On"を使わない日付+半角コロン+半角スペース+文章」の形式に変更しました。

sen.j: 1934年（昭和9年） 1月1日 町制施行
sen.e: On January 1, 1934 the town organization took effect.
On January 1, 1934 the town organization took effect.
January 1, 1934: The town organization took effect.

sen.j: 町長：中西巌（なかにしいわお）（2004年3月～）2期目
sen.e: Mayor: Iwao NAKANISHI (from March, 2004), second term
Mayor: Iwao NAKANISHI (from March, 2004), second term
Mayor: Iwao NAKANISHI (from March, 2004), second term

sen.e: Central station: Kasagi Station on the Kansai Main Line, operated by the West Japan Railway Company (JR West)
Central station: Kasagi Station on the Kansai Main Line, operated by the West Japan Railway Company (JR West)
Central station: Kasagi Station on the Kansai Main Line, operated by the West Japan Railway Company (JR West)

sen.j: 京都府道・奈良県道4号笠置山添線
sen.e: Kyoto Prefecture Road, Nara Prefectural Road 4, Kasagi Yamazoe Line
Kyoto Prefecture Road, Nara Prefectural Road 4, Kasagi Yamazoe Line
Kasagi Yamazoe Line of Kyoto/Nara Prefectural Route 4

sen.j: 奈良県道・京都府道33号奈良笠置線
sen.e: Nara Prefectural Road, Kyoto Prefecture Road 33, Nara Kasagi Line
Nara Prefectural Road, Kyoto Prefecture Road 33, Nara Kasagi Line

sen.j: 名所・旧跡・観光スポット・祭事・催事
sen.e: Historic scenes, sightseeing spots, festivals, events
Historic scenes, sightseeing spots, festivals, events
Scenic sites, historic sites, tourist spots, festivals and events

sen.j: 週末には、笠置橋下西の木津川 (京都府)河川敷で、水遊びのレジャーに訪れる観光客で、人・クルマがいっぱいになる。
sen.e: On weekends, the river area along the Kizu-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture), located beneath and west of the Kasagi-bashi Bridge, is full of tourists and their cars who visit the place for leisure, such as dabbling.
On weekends, the river area along the Kizu-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture), located beneath and west of the Kasagi-bashi Bridge, is full of tourists and their cars visiting the place.
On weekends, the river area along the Kizu-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture), located beneath and west of the Kasagi-bashi Bridge, is full of tourists and their cars visiting the place.

sen.j: 木津川沿いの国道163号でアクセスできる。
sen.e: The place can be accessed via National route 163 that runs along the Kizu-gawa River.
The place can be accessed via National route 163 that runs along the Kizu-gawa River.
The place can be accessed via National Route 163 that runs along the Kizu-gawa River.

sen.j: 笠置町の市外局番は全域0743(市内局番は95、奈良第2MA)。
sen.e: The area code across Kasagi-cho is 0743 (the local exchange prefix is 95, Nara 2 MA).
The area code across Kasagi-cho is 0743 (the local exchange prefix is 95, Nara 2 MA).
The area code across Kasagi-cho is 0743 (the local exchange prefix is 95, Nara second message area (MA)).
sen.cmt: 奈良第2MA→Nara second message area (MA) としました。

sen.j: 南山城村および生駒市、天理市、大和郡山市、山添村、奈良市(旧月ヶ瀬村、都祁村)、大阪府四條畷市(田原台地区、生駒局管内)へは市内局番から通話できる。
sen.e: Minami-yamashiro-mura, Ikoma City, Tenri City, Yamatokoriyama City, Yamazoe-mura, Nara City (formerly Tsukigase-mura, Tsuge-mura), and Shijonawate City of Osaka Prefecture (Tawaradai area, within Ikoma Office) can be connected by numbers beginning with the local exchange number.

Minami-yamashiro-mura, Ikoma City, Tenri City, Yamatokoriyama City, Yamazoe-mura, Nara City (formerly Tsukigase-mura, Tsuge-mura), and Shijonawate City of Osaka Prefecture (Tawaradai area, within Ikoma Office) can be connected by numbers beginning with the local exchange number.

Minami-yamashiro-mura, Ikoma City, Tenri City, Yamatokoriyama City, Yamazoe-mura, Nara City (formerly Tsukigase-mura, Tsuge-mura), and Shijonawate City of Osaka Prefecture (Tawaradai area, within Ikoma Office) can be connected by numbers beginning with the local exchange number.

sen.j: また、奈良市の大部分を占める市外局番0742(奈良第1MA)のエリアへは市内料金が適用され(但し市外局番は必要)、奈良県内(吉野郡など)へは県内通話となるが、南山城村を除く京都府域への通話は県外通話となる。
sen.e: To calling the numbers with the area code 0742 (Nara 1 MA), the major part of Nara City, the local rates are applied (though the area code is required); the calls to Nara Prefecture (including Yoshino-gun) are the in-prefecture calls; and the calls to Kyoto Prefecture except for Minami-yamashiro-mura are the out-of-prefecture calls.

Local rates are applied (though the area code is required) to numbers with the area code 0742 (Nara 1 MA), the major part of Nara City; calls to Nara Prefecture (including Yoshino-gun) are in-prefecture calls; and calls to Kyoto Prefecture except for Minami-yamashiro-mura are out-of-prefecture calls.

Local rates are applied (though the area code is required) to numbers with the area code 0742 (Nara first message area (MA)), the major part of Nara City; calls to Nara Prefecture (including Yoshino-gun) are in-prefecture calls; and calls to Kyoto Prefecture except for Minami-yamashiro-mura are out-of-prefecture calls.
sen.cmt: 奈良第1MA→Nara first message area (MA) としました。

sen.e: Prefectural Kasagi-yama Mountain natural park
Prefectural Kasagi-yama Mountain natural park
Prefectural Kasagi-yama Mountain natural park

sen.j: 後醍醐天皇行宮遺跡
sen.e: Remains of Emperor Godaigo's Angu (temporary lodging built to accommodate an Imperial visit)
Remains of Emperor Godaigo's Angu (temporary lodging built to accommodate an Imperial visit)
Remains of Emperor Godaigo's Angu (temporary lodging built to accommodate an Imperial visit)

sen.j: 笠置寺解脱の鐘
sen.e: Bell for deliverance from earthly bondage in Kasagi-dera Temple
Bell for deliverance from earthly bondage in Kasagi-dera Temple
Bell for deliverance from earthly bondage in Kasagi-dera Temple

sen.j: 虚空蔵石 線刻弥勒菩薩坐像の磨崖仏
sen.e: Kokuzo-seki stone, Magaibutsu (a Buddhist image carved into the surface of natural rock such as a cliff face, a large rock, or a stone cave), a line engraved seated Maitreya
Kokuzo-seki stone, Magaibutsu (a Buddhist image carved into the surface of natural rock such as a cliff face, a large rock, or a stone cave), a line engraved seated Maitreya
Kokuzo-seki stone, Magaibutsu (a Buddhist image carved into the surface of natural rock such as a cliff face, a large rock, or a stone cave), a line engraved seated Maitreya

sen.j: 弥勒磨崖仏 元弘の変で焼失し、現在は舟形光背の輪郭が残る。
sen.e: Maitreya Magaibutsu was lost in the Genko no hen, the Genko Incident; at present, the outline of boat-shaped halo remains.
Maitreya Magaibutsu was lost in the Genko no hen, the Genko Incident; at present, the outline of boat-shaped halo remains.
Maitreya Magaibutsu was lost in the Genko no hen, the Genko Incident; at present, the outline of boat-shaped halo remains.

sen.j: この磨崖仏を写したものが、大野寺（奈良県室生村）と加茂町当尾の線刻弥勒磨崖仏である。
sen.e: It is the line engraved Magaibutsu at the Ono-dera Temple (Murou-mura, Nara Prefecture) and in Too, Kamo-cho, that copied this Magaibutsu.
It is the line engraved Magaibutsu at the Ono-dera Temple (Murou-mura, Nara Prefecture) and in Too, Kamo-cho, that copied this Magaibutsu.
It is the line engraved Magaibutsu at the Ono-dera Temple (Muro-mura, Nara Prefecture) and in Too, Kamo-cho, that copied this Magaibutsu.
